inputMethods.title: Select Video Source
inputMethods.dragDropFiles: Drag & drop files here, or click to select
inputMethods.supportedFormats: Supported formats: MP4, WEBM, MP3, WAV (max 25MB)

output.processingVideo: Processing. This may take a few minutes...

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyDescription: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.
settings.geminiApiKeyHelp: Required for all functions. Get one at
settings.youtubeApiKeyHelp: Required for YouTube search. Get one at
settings.geminiStep3: Create a new key or select existing
settings.geminiStep5: Paste it into the field above
settings.cacheDescription: Clear all cached subtitles and downloaded videos to free up space.
settings.cacheClearError: Error clearing cache. Please try again.
settings.confirmClearCache: Are you sure you want to clear all cached subtitles and videos? This cannot be undone.

lyrics.timingInstructions: Drag the timestamps to adjust the timing of each subtitle. Sticky mode will adjust all following subtitles.

errors.apiKeyRequired: Please set your API key in the settings first.
errors.invalidInput: Please provide a valid input (YouTube URL, search result, or file upload).
errors.invalidFile: Invalid file format or size. Please check the supported formats.
